5   package net.sourceforge.pmd.typeresolution.testdata;
6   
7   import net.sourceforge.pmd.typeresolution.testdata.dummytypes.GenericClass;
8   import net.sourceforge.pmd.typeresolution.testdata.dummytypes.GenericSuperClassA;
9   
10  
11  /*
12   * TODO: add anonymous class this (Allocation expression)
13   * TODO: add primitives, parameterized arrays
14   * TODO: diamond, type parmeter declarations can shadow Class declarations
15   */
16  
17  public class FieldAccessGenericSimple extends GenericSuperClassA<Long> {
18      GenericClass<String, Double> genericField;
19      GenericClass<String, GenericClass<Number, Double>> genericTypeArg;
20      FieldAccessGenericSimple fieldAcc;
21  
22      void foo(GenericClass<Integer, Character> param) {
23          GenericClass<Float, Long> local = null;
24  
25          // access a generic field through member field
26          // Primary[Prefix[Name[genericField.first]]]
27          genericField.first = "";
28          genericField.second = new Double(0);
29  
30          // access a generic field whose type depends on a generic type argument
31          // Primary[Prefix[Name[genericTypeArg.second.second]]]
32          genericTypeArg.second.second = new Double(0);
33  
34          // access a generic field through a local or a parameter
35          // Primary[Prefix[Name[param.first]]]
36          param.first = new Integer(0);
37          local.second = new Long(0);
38  
39          // access a generic field whose type depends on indirect type arguments
40          // Primary[Prefix[Name[generic.generic.first]]]
41          param.generic.first = new Character('c');
42          local.generic.second = new Float(0);
43          genericField.generic.generic.generic.first = new Double(0);
44  
45          // test inherited generic
46          // Primary[Prefix[Name[generic.first]]]
47          fieldA = new Long(0);
48          fieldB.generic.second = "";
49  
50          // test inherited generic
51          // Primary[Prefix[Name[fieldAcc.fieldA]]]
52          fieldAcc.fieldA = new Long(0);
53      }
54  
55      public class Nested extends GenericSuperClassA<Long> {
56          void foo() {
57              fieldA = new Long(0);
58          }
59      }
60  }
